what: Utility Code for UC Merced CLC Studies
title: Utility Code for UC Merced CLC Studies
text: goal merced.clc provide set functions loading reference data producing computations commonly used UC Merced Community Labor Center.

title: add_commas — add_commas
text: Formats table rendered dt_table() add commas specified numeric columns values 999.

title: add_commas — add_commas
text: df table produced using dt_table() vars character vector variable names formatted commas digits integer many places past decimal place include. Default rounded whole number

title: add_commas — add_commas
text: rendered dt table specified columns containing commas denote thousands

title: add_commas — add_commas
code: if (FALSE) dt_table(df = mtcars %>%                               mutate(sepal.length.large = Sepal.Length * 1000),                             row_nums = TRUE) %>%                             add_commas(vars = "sepal.length.large") # \dontrun{}

title: ca_regions_fips — ca_regions_fips
text: Basic California region county information grouping mortality geographies

title: ca_regions_fips — ca_regions_fips
text: tibble 58 rows 5 columns: region Basic region number region_name Basic region names county_name County Name county_fips County Federal Information Processing Standard code county_cdph County CA Department Public Health code

title: dt_table — dt_table
text: Renders standard interactive data table dataset options specifying look interactivity table.

title: dt_table — dt_table
code: dt_table(df, filter = FALSE, search = FALSE, page = TRUE, row_nums = FALSE)

title: dt_table — dt_table
text: df dataset want show output table. default TRUE filter boolean whether display column filters. default FALSE search boolean whether display search bar. default FALSE page boolean whether break table pages. default TRUE row_nums boolean whether show row numbers. default FALSE

title: dt_table — dt_table
text: rendered DT table
